title: [Gameplay] sol and anivia's skills vs Kass's q
body:
So I noticed that Kass Q cancels the sol's W. Is it intended that kass q can interrupted the spell casting?
But at the same time, I noticed that kass q does not interrupt anivia's ult. Shouldnt it also cancel ani's ult if it interrupts sol's w?
It came to me quite annoying whenever i play those champs against kass.
Is this a bug?

replies.body:
Actually, there's no bug here.

Kassadin's Q interrupts channels, but it's not a silence anymore. It only interrupts channels.

Both Anivia's R and Aurelian Sol's W are toggled abilities, not channels. Neither of them should be interrupted by Kassadin's Q.

Except that Aurelian Sol's W makes itself a special case. Aurelian Sol's W self-cancels whenever Aurelian Sol is disabled with a hard crowd control or a silence, anything that prevents Aurelian Sol from using abilities.

Kassadin's channel interrupt is evidently an ability-preventing crowd control.

Anivia's ult, according to the wiki at least, is supposed to be stopped by any form of interrupting crowd control, which definitely sounds like Kass's Q. If it's not supposed to be stopped by channel interruption, it definitely needs clarification.
His Q stops channels, It even says that in the tooltip.

Yea i noticed but why not ani's ult?
if it happens to sol's w then shouldnt it also happen to ani's ult?
It used to, and it should, actually..
The bug would be that it doesn't stop Anivia's ult.  I thought it did cancel her ult though.
